plugins.prepareCmd: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const pkg = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('./package.json')); const extPkg = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('./vscode-extension/package.json')); extPkg.version = '${nextRelease.version}'; fs.writeFileSync('./vscode-extension/package.json', JSON.stringify(extPkg, null, 2) + '\n');"
